docs.text: MkLorum For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Nature and purpose of financial reporting and accounting a mixed attribute model eg: fixed assets(building) ——〉 historical cost financial assets ——〉 current market prices 历史价值(historical cost): - 需要计算折旧 公允价值（fair value）: 1. 有公平，活跃的交易市场 2. 无公平交易市场，但可以对比同类产品 3. 依靠估值技术 在公允价值的变动会导致income的波动变化较大
docs.title: Financial

docs.text: a mixed attribute model eg: fixed assets(building) ——〉 historical cost financial assets ——〉 current market prices 历史价值(historical cost): - 需要计算折旧 公允价值（fair value）: 1. 有公平，活跃的交易市场 2. 无公平交易市场，但可以对比同类产品 3. 依靠估值技术 在公允价值的变动会导致income的波动变化较大
